title: 3 Development of Rift Valley fever vaccine suitable for human and livestock use - George Warimwe

tasks.task: Presenting a vaccine development case study for Rift Valley fever.
subtasks: Introduction and background on the speaker's work.
Explanation of the need to consider One Health in vaccine development.
Description of Rift Valley fever, its transmission, and impact on livestock and humans.
Discussion of current vaccine options for livestock and the need for a human vaccine.
Description of the Chadoks vaccine platform and its use in developing the RVF vaccine.
Presentation of preclinical and livestock trial results, emphasizing safety and efficacy.
Explanation of field trial plans and ongoing analysis for regulatory approval.
Overview of the human phase one trial and expected outcomes.
Addressing the challenges in predicting outbreaks for vaccine efficacy studies.
Discussion of regulatory strategies and stakeholder engagement for vaccine deployment.
Q&A session highlighting interdisciplinary collaboration and personal experiences.
